purpose: The email announces the first call for papers for the VMCAI 2026 conference, inviting submissions from researchers in the fields of Verification, Model Checking, and Abstract Interpretation. It provides details about the conference dates, location, submission deadlines, and notification dates.
evidence_sentences: VMCAI provides a forum for researchers from the communities of Verification, Model Checking, and Abstract Interpretation, facilitating interaction, cross-fertilization, and advancement of hybrid methods that combine these and related areas.
We invite regular papers, tools papers, and case studies.
VMCAI 2026 will take place during January 12-13, 2026 as a physical (in-person) event in Rennes, France, co-located with POPL 2026.
